title: 3 - Our Favorite Thirder
description: In this episode, Georgia and Karen discuss the Cameron Todd Willingham arson case, the Oakland County child killings and comedian/We Watch Wrestling podcast co-host Tom Sibley shares his hometown upholstery murder story.
author: exactlyrightmedia@gmail.com (Exactly Right)
